snippet: Mr. Capers, a longtime prosecutor in the district, will replace Loretta E. Lynch, who left there to become the United States attorney general.
abstract: Senate confirms Robert L Capers as United States attorney for Eastern District of New York, high profile office with history of prosecuting  terrorism cases, Mafia leaders, sex-trafficking and white-collar crimes.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Capers, a longtime prosecutor in the district, will replace Loretta E. Lynch, who left there to become the United States attorney general.

headline.main: Senate Confirms Robert Capers as U.S. Attorney for Eastern District of New York
headline.print_headline: Senate Confirms a New U.S. Attorney
